data.message: You told me holler if I've been down the same road, well we see we can get free from breaking barriers, and he'll from me getting named jesus to getting arrested three days later, I read a message to the nations holily , so it quoted I got to introduce something you know, and it was the prophesy when I got beaten and drugged with some horrible shit man, they tried making me then pay them 200000000000.00 for the ocean because I was breathing they tried saying they wanted new judges over the nations, humans instead of their God they wanted to tax the whole world in front of me with open trade routes, beneficial, only for me but while we use materials and prices go up the value of the source  on earth goes down, if it costs more, so I wrote my come up, on paper and said after 2 years of knowing how to check up things and living up to a priest order of malcheZeldek with invisible healing powers, I said farmers Shepards and towns people save the firstborn cow, make a side bank and get a whole second standard of living and share that through the major four continents , and know you will make something that's food, and we get food and have people work get on new jobs start building while not getting paid and make it look like a church, open up new study, and drop new eco friendly engines in the inspection dates for free, recall quality care or whatever I did it, to get around loosing the ocean, wiping out everything and the oxygen level being good we can swim in space all day long bitches, don't it get you dizzy too
